verses.verse: There was a <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H347>Job<s%>; and that <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H8535>perfect<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%>, and one that <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5493>turned<s%> away from <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

Now it came to pass on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3320>present<s%> themselves before <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H7854>Satan<s%> also <S%H935>came<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

Then Satan <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6030>said<s%>, From going to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and from walking up and down in <S%H1980>it<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, Hast thou <S%H7760>considered<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%>? for there is none like him in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, a <S%H8535>perfect<s%> and an <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H376>one<s%> that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and turneth away from <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

Hast not thou made a <S%H7753>hedge<s%> about <S%H1157>him<s%>, and about his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and about all that he <S%H5439>hath<s%>, on every side? thou hast <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and his <S%H4735>substance<s%> is <S%H6555>increased<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7854>Satan<s%>, <S%H3027>Behold<s%>, all that he hath is in thy power; only upon himself put not <S%H7971>forth<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>. So <S%H7854>Satan<s%> went <S%H7971>forth<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And it fell on a <S%H3117>day<s%> when his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>,

that there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> unto <S%H347>Job<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1241>oxen<s%> were <S%H2790>plowing<s%>, and the <S%H860>asses<s%> <S%H7462>feeding<s%> beside <S%H3027>them<s%>;

and the <S%H7614>Sabeans<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon <S%H3947>them<s%>, and took them away: <S%H5221>yea<s%>, they have slain the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and I only am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> alone to tell <S%H5046>thee<s%>.

While he was yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H559>another<s%>, and said, The <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and hath burned <S%H1197>up<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H5288>the<s%>, servants, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H4422>them<s%>; and I only am escaped alone to tell <S%H5046>thee<s%>.

While he was yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H559>another<s%>, and said, The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>bands<s%>, and <S%H6584>fell<s%> upon the <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and have taken them <S%H3947>away<s%>, <S%H5221>yea<s%>, and slain the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and I only am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> alone to tell <S%H5046>thee<s%>.

While he was yet <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H559>another<s%>, and said, Thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>;

Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H4598>robe<s%>, and <S%H1494>shaved<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%>;
